QuestData.Title: Steady Hand
QuestData.Description: Nearby to the north, you will find Terrath the Steady. He has taken upon the task of pulling the stone dragons back into the fold. We find ourselves repeating this trial every few hundred years... the stone dragons are fickle, and bend only to strength.$B$BTerrath is balanced and reasonable, but his goals may not be easily accomplished. Go to him. Appeal to the more balanced side of the Stonemother.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Terrath the Steady at the Pale Roost.
QuestData.RewardText: Greetings, $r. I have been told of your coming. If you wish to aid me, then perhaps I can be of aid to you as well.
